channel.title: Softwares on Timm Lichte
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on Timm Lichte

item.title: Software & Resources
item.description: I’ve been involved in the creation of the following software and resources. Language resources COLF-VID & German SemEval-2013 task 5b: Data set of the Shared Task on the Disambiguation of German Verbal Idioms at KONVENS 2021 COLF-VID: Corpus of Literal and Figurative Readings PARSEME Shared Task: Corpus of German idioms Grammar engineering XMG-WebGUI: A web GUI for compiling and displaying metagrammars written with XMG. TuLiPA:Â A parsing environment for variants of Tree-Adjoining Grammar.
